heroSection.title: Perk Management System
heroSection.description: Turn other companies customers into your leads by offering perks from your products and services.

ctaSection.title: Exclusive Perks Page in Seconds
ctaSection.description: Easily create and share a login-free perks page without technical skills. Manage which perks your clients can access and attract new clients by distributing your perks through companies you've selected.

features.title: One Click Partnerships
features.description: Companies can select your perks to offer to their clients through their perks page. Similarly, you can choose perks to benefit your clients with products and services from other companies.

features.title: Shareable Perks Page
features.description: Increase your reach by having companies display your perks on their perks pages, attracting qualified leads to your offerings while prioritizing customers privacy.

features.title: AI Partnerships
features.description: Receive perk insights based on your clients behavior. Strengthen relationships with other companies by analyzing their performance.

features.title: Fully customizable
features.description: Without any coding skills, customize every detail of your branding, including the domain URL, to reflect your brand's identity.

features.title: Embed Perks Page
features.description: Integrate your perks page seamlessly into your site or app without coding skills.

testimonialsSection.title: Testimonials
testimonialsSection.description: What our customers are saying about us

testimonials.name: Alex Johnson
testimonials.content: Codepilot has been a game-changer for our startup. The reduction in development time allowed us to launch our app weeks ahead of schedule, giving us a significant advantage in a competitive market. Highly recommend it to any team looking to make a mark fast

testimonials.name: Samantha Lee
testimonials.content: Implementing Codepilot into our development workflow has dramatically improved our effic    iency. The pre-configured environments and best practices embedded in the platform have significantly reduced our onboarding time for new developers.
testimonials.role: Project Manager at Digital Solutions Corp.

testimonials.name: Ethan Rivera
testimonials.content: As a freelancer, every minute counts, and Codepilot has been instrumental in helping me deliver high-quality work on tight deadlines. The ease of use, coupled with powerful customization options, means I can cater to diverse client needs without starting from zero each time.

pricing.title: Enable the best experience
pricing.description: Choose a plan and start your 14-day free trial. Generate appointments and leads or source talent online, risk-free.

personal.name: Personal

footer.description: (pronounced “you-and-akin”) is a San Francisco native word for a village with a shared identity. As a philanthropy startup, we offer our platform for free or through recurring donations that support Indigenous-led organizations protecting forests. Donations from San Francisco specifically support the work of the Association of Ramaytush Ohlone, the original peoples of the San Francisco Peninsula.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some common questions about Codepilot. For more information, please contact our support team.

faqs.question: What is Codepilot?
faqs.answer: Codepilot is a comprehensive SaaS boilerplate designed to help developers launch applications faster by providing a pre-configured foundation, ensuring best practices, and facilitating scalability.

faqs.question: How can Codepilot reduce development time?
faqs.answer: Codepilot reduces development time by offering customizable templates and state-of-the-art tools that eliminate the need to build from scratch, allowing developers to focus on creating unique features.

faqs.question: Is Codepilot suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, Codepilot is designed to be user-friendly for beginners while offering advanced features for experienced developers, making it an ideal tool for projects of any size and complexity.

faqs.question: Can I use Codepilot for commercial projects?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Codepilot is built to support both personal and commercial projects, providing the scalability and robustness needed for enterprise-grade applications.

faqs.question: What kind of support does Codepilot offer?
faqs.answer: Codepilot offers comprehensive support through documentation, a dedicated support team, and a community forum where users can share insights and seek help from fellow developers.

faqs.question: How often is Codepilot updated?
faqs.answer: Codepilot is regularly updated to incorporate the latest development trends, security patches, and community feedback to ensure it remains at the forefront of technology.

faqs.question: Does Codepilot offer customization options?
faqs.answer: Yes, Codepilot provides extensive customization options to ensure that developers can tailor their projects to meet specific requirements, making it a flexible solution for a wide range of applications.
